meanings.definition: A type of caterpillar that feeds on the buds of plants.
meanings.sent1: The budworms crawled on the rose bush, munching on the flower buds.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to protect their crops from budworms that harm the plant buds.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous budworms played hide and seek among the garden buds.
meanings.sent4: The budworms were like tiny garden thieves, stealing the precious buds.
meanings.sent5: The delicate buds trembled as the budworms devoured them one by one.

meanings.definition: The larvae of certain moths that damage crops by feeding on buds and flowers.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed the field to prevent budworms from destroying the crop buds.
meanings.sent2: Budworms can cause significant damage to agricultural fields by eating the plant buds.
meanings.sent3: The budworms threw a party in the cornfield, much to the dismay of the farmer.
meanings.sent4: The budworms were like tiny wrecking balls, demolishing the delicate flower buds.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the budworms feasting on the buds was a heartbreaking scene for the farmer.
